text:
Hi, 
I'm patching 33k windows 10 clients using intune update policies. Every month
almost 2k devices are not updating, since many months ie., some of them were
patched 3 months ago, and some 4 months ago and some of them were patched last
year. 
Can someone provide some ideas to remediate them using intune or sccm or
scripts. 
Regards,
SK. 
--
%2B2fD134M3OnZQNFM6yGukMkqDoQ3boz7ttw%40mail.gmail.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement]
